title: `FileNotFoundError: [WinError 3] The system cannot find the path specified:` invalid file path
body:
### Is there an existing issue for this?

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### Bug description

evaluate_network creates an h5 file but encounters an error making labelled images 

### Operating System

Windows

### DeepLabCut version

2.2.0.2

### DeepLabCut mode

single animal

### Device type

gpu

### Steps To Reproduce

 dlc.evaluate_network(config_path, Shuffles=[1], plotting=True)


### Relevant log output

```shell
Running  DLC_resnet50_GRAB_DA_DMS_RIG104_J005_J010Oct12shuffle1_16000  with # of trainingiterations: 16000
C:\Users\hjj296\.conda\envs\DEEPLABCUT\lib\site-packages\tensorflow\python\keras\engine\base_layer_v1.py:1694: UserWarning: `layer.apply` is deprecated and will be removed in a future version. Please use `layer.__call__` method instead.
  warnings.warn('`layer.apply` is deprecated and '
2021-10-18 13:31:48.427594: I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc:1510] Created device /job:localhost/replica:0/task:0/device:GPU:0 with 5979 MB memory:  -> device: 0, name: GeForce RTX 2070 SUPER, pci bus id: 0000:65:00.0, compute capability: 7.5
Analyzing data...
100it [00:03, 28.87it/s]
Done and results stored for snapshot:  snapshot-16000
Results for 16000  training iterations: 95 1 train error: 3.05 pixels. Test error: 15.48  pixels.
With pcutoff of 0.6  train error: 2.92 pixels. Test error: 5.16 pixels
Thereby, the errors are given by the average distances between the labels by DLC and the scorer.
Plotting...
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
FileNotFoundError                         Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-7-6cc7806403c2> in <module>
----> 1 dlc.evaluate_network(config_path, Shuffles=[1], plotting=True)

~\.conda\envs\DEEPLABCUT\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut\pose_estimation_tensorflow\core\evaluate.py in evaluate_network(config, Shuffles, trainingsetindex, plotting, show_errors, comparisonbodyparts, gputouse, rescale, modelprefix)
    895                                 + Snapshots[snapindex],
    896                             )
--> 897                             auxiliaryfunctions.attempttomakefolder(foldername)
    898                             Plotting(
    899                                 cfg,

~\.conda\envs\DEEPLABCUT\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut\utils\auxiliaryfunctions.py in attempttomakefolder(foldername, recursive)
    297             os.makedirs(foldername)
    298         else:
--> 299             os.mkdir(foldername)
    300
    301

FileNotFoundError: [WinError 3] The system cannot find the path specified: 'C:/Users/hjj296/Documents/DLC/DeepLabCut/projects/GRAB_DA_DMS_RIG104_J005_J010-HJ-2021-10-12\\evaluation-results\\iteration-0\\GRAB_DA_DMS_RIG104_J005_J010Oct12-trainset95shuffle1\\LabeledImages_DLC_resnet50_GRAB_DA_DMS_RIG104_J005_J010Oct12shuffle1_16000_snapshot-16000'
```


### Anything else?

_No response_
